text: The Great Gatsby is a drama movie released in 2013. It is based on the novel The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald. The movie was an Australian-American production. It was directed by Baz Luhrmann. The screenplay was written by Luhrmann and Craig Pearce. The main actors in it are Leonardo DiCaprio, Tobey Maguire, Carey Mulligan, Joel Edgerton and Isla Fisher. This movie also has Bollywood actor Amitabh Bachchan in a cameo appearance. ==Sources== Category:2013 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Australian drama movies Category:Australian romance movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in the 1920s Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Baz Luhrmann
title: The Great Gatsby (2013 movie)
